mainEntity.name: Are OSHA kits available in multiple languages?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, many OSHA-compliant kits now come with multilingual signage, training materials, and documentation to support diverse crews.

mainEntity.name: What languages are most commonly included in multilingual safety kits?

acceptedAnswer.text: English and Spanish are the most common, though some kits also include French or visual icons to bridge language gaps.

mainEntity.name: Do bilingual kits still meet OSHA standards?

acceptedAnswer.text: Absolutely — as long as required safety information is clearly communicated, multilingual kits can fully comply with OSHA regulations.
